0.desc: You notice a weakspot that could be further exposed with a swing of your pickaxe...

1.desc: A small hole on the speaker glistens in the light, just large enough to fit a fishing hook in...

2.desc: It looks like the boss is literally made of wood... fortunately your hatchet is on hand.

3.desc: The air feels electric, as though there are spirits abound. Maybe they could be of assistance...

4.desc: Knowing which toxins will be most effective will aid in your next move...

5.desc: Perhaps a bone could be dislodged by entangling it with the end of your net...

6.desc: Trapping critters has given you a keen sense of where best to strike...

7.desc: You don't quite know why, but your ability to cook various meals fills you with confidence!

8.desc: All that time spent in the tube has got to be useful for something, right? Maybe this situation?

9.desc: You notice the divine signaling to you from their volcanos with what is likely helpful advice...

10.desc: A good bill of health can help turn any fight around, regardless of the opponent.

11.desc: The wisdom that comes with large mana reserves will make your moves that more effective...

12.desc: You take a moment to pinpoint the small areas of weakness to aim for...

13.desc: You've heard that great defence is the best offence, and are hoping it holds true here...

14.desc: With a spring in your step, you consider how best to use your agile frame to your advantage...

15.desc: There's got to be something useful in that massive inventory of yours...

16.desc: You've learned a thing or two from all your past endeavors, making your next move all the better...

17.desc: Cake by cake has fallen before you, and how different could a massive boss really be from a cake?

18.desc: You lean on the vast amount of experience you've accumulated to drive your decision...

19.desc: Even something as trivial as defeating the weakest opponent can be helpful if done endlessly...

20.desc: Standing firm against charging mobs has given you determination in situations like this...

21.desc: The hours you've spent learning to fight with a height disadvantage are sure to pay off here...

22.desc: Knowledge and skills can only get you so far, but THIS is something you can always rely on...

23.desc: Dissecting the choccie monsters gives a deep understanding of... wait how does this help?

24.desc: Construction is a lot more than just building, it's also about breaking stuff...
